ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Permission.Patient_Navigation_Management, ISCHANGED( Application_Status__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName <> 'Patient_Navigation', !$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c, LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all", LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "application__c" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Patient Navigator Managers can only edit Patient Navigation Applications.
